Abandons the shared state and destroys the stored task object.

As with {{lc|std::promise::~promise}}, if the shared state is abandoned before it was made ready, an {{lc|std::future_error}} exception is stored with the error code {{lc|std::future_errc::broken_promise}}).

===Parameters===
(none)
